description:
Instead of coming to class, Ayanami is playing games, making Javelin and Z23 agonize about how to make her come back.
Out of ideas, they go to consult Akashi, but they get more of an advertisement for a cute new invention than a consultation...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Is Real Life a God Tier Game?
リアルは神ゲーなんです?
